# Roots On Rise

> Roots On Rise is a cultural boutique helping families share Hindu heritage with children through beautifully illustrated books.

## About

Roots On Rise creates children's books and cultural products that celebrate Hindu mythology, heritage, and traditions. Our mission is to spark curiosity and cultivate a deep connection to culture in young minds.
